Description.Text: The reception is open 24 hours. There is a laundry service, fire detection system, currency exchange, garage for guest's use, and a fax and photocopy service. Nearby you will find a wide variety of shops, restaurants, cafe's and bars. (AB06/09) The building is of elegant modern design, fitting in perfectly with the modernist buildings around it. This aparthotel is located in central Madrid in the most important business district, AZCA and just a few metres from Paseo de la Castellana, the city's main thoroughfare. Surrounding the property you will find buildings most representative of Madrid's modernist architecture, and several cultural and shopping areas. There are 3 metro stops next to the property - Cuatro Caminos, Nuevos Ministerios, and Santiago Bernabeu. It is only five stops to the Gran Via and six stops to the Puerta del Sol in the very centre of historic Madrid with its multitude of museums, theatres, palaces, churches, nightlife, and shops.

Guest Rooms - The rooms are of discreet, functional, and elegant decoration. All furniture is modern and comfortable. All the services of an aparthotel are offered at this complex. There is room service, air-conditioning, individual telephone, heating, a fully-fitted kitchenette, in-room safety box, and satellite television in each unit.
